SEARCH
Package com.fyp.authorizationserver.controller

Class UserRegistrationController

java.lang.Object
com.fyp.authorizationserver.controller.UserRegistrationController
@RestController public class UserRegistrationController extends Object
Controller for handling user registration requests.

This controller provides API endpoints for user registration within the system. It relies on the CustomUserDetailsService to handle the actual registration process.

  • Method Details

    • register

      @PostMapping(path="/register", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> register(@RequestBody UserRegistrationDTO userRegistrationDTO)
      Registers a new user in the system.

      This method handles HTTP POST requests for user registration, accepting user details encapsulated within a UserRegistrationDTO object. If the user already exists, it throws an AlreadyExistsException and returns an appropriate response.

      Parameters:
      userRegistrationDTO - The user registration details wrapped in UserRegistrationDTO.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the outcome of the registration attempt. Returns an HTTP 200 OK response on successful registration or HTTP 400 Bad Request if the username already exists.
